Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Independence
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses temp. rerouted WB: Roosevelt, Independence, Congress, Pulaski and Roosevelt; EB: Roosevelt, Pulaski, 5th, Harrison, Central Pk and Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Independence, due to street blockage.

Westbound: Roosevelt, Independence, Congress, Pulaski and Roosevelt

Eastbound: Roosevelt, Pulaski, 5th, Harrison, Central Park and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Trains bypassing Roosevelt Station
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Roosevelt due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Roosevelt due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
